Dialogue.Page: Mod: The Machine Authors: Small Bug
The Machine is one of the two mods that won second place in the first mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.
This mod takes the player to a new solar system, with its own set of unique planets, dangerous hazards, and cataclysmic events.
Crucially, The Machine also introduces a new mystery, tasking the player with uncovering the clues needed to prevent the collapse of the system.
